channel.title: Private servers, help pls
channel.description:
ok everytime i try to join a new server on moparscape
-file -new server -'ip here' then username + pass and login, error blahblah can any1 post a guide of how to join existing servers? i wanna play with ppl and not rot aay all by myself on a server nobody can join, please help
greetings, gvs

item.title: Private servers, help pls

item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

That is the way unless you need to change the port.
